name: Intelientations
description:
A game based in the present about a presentation making software gone rogue.

The main character in his workplace

Currently i have the prologue done which was basically just a test to see if it would work. You can download it here, although it has only like 5 minutes of gameplay.

Homescreen of the in game laptop

Right now i am working on the full game and will post updates on the progress here. Any feedback , suggestions or ideas will be nice.
